name: Transhuman Evolution
description:
This is a small prototype aiming to discover potential outcomes of the transhuman evolution over multiple time periods.

You will go through multiple time periods within each you'll have a set budget that you can spend on researching new technologies and transhuman parts. After each time period a report is generated highlighting some advancements in the transhuman evolution. Furthermore, you'll get a dynamic generated text talking about some effects the decision you made brought to life.

NOTE: This is a prototype. The information contained is far from being realistic or accurate. Some data, especially in the report may not make any sense!

This is a solo-student project made over the course of about 3 weeks.
